name: Daily Digest of Tickets
mjml:
.link-nostyle { color: inherit; text-decoration: none; } .cell { text-align: left; padding: 8px; font-family: "Arial"; } .cell a { font-weight: 600; font-color: #005ead; text-decoration: none; } .cell.aligncenter { text-align: center !important; } {{ DigestName }} Tickets Worked Company Name Notes Status Opened {% for item in TicketsWorked %} {{ item.company }} {{ item.notes }} {{ item.status }} {{ item.date }} {% endfor %} View Worked Tickets Idle Tickets > 3 Days Company Name Notes Assigned Tech Days Idle {% for item in IdleTickets %} {{ item.company }} {{ item.notes }} {{ item.assignedtech }} {{ item.idleAgo }} {% endfor %} View Idle Tickets Tickets Closed Company Name Notes Total Hours Date Opened {% for item in TicketsClosed %} {{ item.company }} {{ item.notes }} {{ item.totalhours }} {{ item.date }} {% endfor %} View Closed Tickets
